description: Internal unique identifier of the account associated to this organizationâ€“role membership. Used to link to the master user record.
Identifier for the company/unit within the fleet platform this membership applies to; likely an organization code rather than a name; confirm with SME.
Reference to the permission role granted within the specified organization; joins to the role catalog to determine access rights and features.
Boolean flag indicating whether this is the primary organization context for the account (used by UI and APIs when no organization is specified).
